title: Merge NA and OCE accounts
body: I just moved my NA account over to OCE and would like to merge them to a single account, I read that this was done for EU-NA and Garena-OCE so will this be available for NA-OCE?

replies.body:
>I just moved my NA account over to OCE

That means you should have only one account. Are you sure you didn't just create a new account on the OCE servers with the same name?
Transfers cost money, you know.

Sorry, I thought you were talking about just transferring the account in place of merging.

My bad.

> [{quoted}](name=incog03,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=aT4kiKXu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T14:38:17.364+0000)
>
> what the %%%% are you talking about? Do you have some sort of brain damage I should be made aware of prior to responding to your posts?

No need to reply like that, he obviously mis-understood you.

I'd submit a ticket to Riot regarding the issue, stating you own both accounts and would like a merge :)
